articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Stunning global picture of Earth taken by a NASA satellite - Daily Mail
articles.description: The image was taken by a recently launched US space agency satellite, NOAA-21, which experts hope will provide vital information about our planet's oceans, atmosphere and land.
articles.content:
It is a striking image of our planet that captures everything from the bright blue hue of the Caribbean Sea to the dense smog above northern India.
But apart from providing a new global perspective … [+7260 chars]

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Stargazers will have a chance to see a new comet at the end of January - Daily Mail
articles.description: C/2022 E3 (ZTF) was discovered in March last year while inside Jupiter's orbit, and will make its closest approach to the sun on January 12 and Earth on February 2.
articles.content:
It's not often that stargazers get the opportunity to spot a comet with the naked eye.
But at the end of this month or possibly the start of February  a newly-discovered space rock will whizz by our… [+5794 chars]
